title: Remembering Wholeness: A Personal Handbook for Thriving in the 21st Century
description: We are hard-wired for joy, happiness, good health, wealth, and loving relationships - God designed us for this outcome. If you are not experiencing this in your life and you want to, it is time.In this groundbreaking new book, Carol Tuttle answers the following questions and much more ...-- Has God given us the power to create the lives we want?-- Do we have a say in our future? Individually, and as a planet?-- Can healing happen immediately?-- Who is God?-- How can Angels help me?-- Why is this the best time to be alive when it can feel like the worst?-- Why do we keep recreating so much pain and struggle? How can we create outpourings of joy and prosperity?
author: Carol Tuttle
